description:
My place is close to Central Park, Time Warner Center, Columbus Circle. You’ll love my place because of the views, the location, and the ambiance. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

Perfect Location Next To Central Park & Time Warner Center.
Top luxury full service doorman building. 
Fully furnished 1br with amazing city views from a high floor. 
Towels, linens, kitchen utensils provided.
Cable TV, wifi ready.
You can use the building amenities for FREE ;)
Building amenities were completely updated last year including a full gym, yoga room, indoor swimming pool, jacuzzi, sauna room, steam room and a resident's lounge. There's also a laundry room on every floor. You are moments away from Central Park, Columbus Circle, Carnegie Hall, shopping, restaurants, theaters and the F, N, R, E, 1, B, D subway lines.

Just email me if you have any qs
name: TOP LUXURY 1BR~FULL SERVICE~POOL~GYM~CITY VIEW
